<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#ab998c57d668a1a2e439d626b8cb5cb6ba5f555c0d1cd740d7b15ba7f13187b8f4"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#ab998c57d668a1a2e439d626b8cb5cb6ba5f555c0d1cd740d7b15ba7f13187b8f4">Pointer</a>   = 0x10,   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See note below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: GEP indices generally traverse nested types, and so a GepNode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (representing a single index) can be associated with some composite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type. The exception is the GEP input, which is a pointer, and not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a composite type (at least not in the sense of having sub-types).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, the corresponding index plays a different role as well: it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simply added to the input pointer. Since pointer types are becoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opaque (i.e. are no longer going to include the pointee type), the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two pieces of information (1) the fact that it&#39;s a pointer, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (2) the pointee type, need to be stored separately. The pointee type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be stored in the PTy member, while the fact that the node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operates on a pointer will be reflected by the flag &quot;Pointer&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#acec0a2e9ee72235c0a7d9967ec69849f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#acec0a2e9ee72235c0a7d9967ec69849f">Flags</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">union </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#a0faa5864d25650e997f929dad7fc9ac1"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/false/gepnode/#a0faa5864d25650e997f929dad7fc9ac1">PTy</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type indexed by this node. For pointer nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is the &quot;pointee&quot; type, and indexing a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If PtrOp was a GEP instruction, it must have already been processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ValueToNodeMap entry for it is the last gep node in the generated</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create an ordered pair of GepNode pointers. The pair will be used in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determining equality. The only purpose of the ordering is to eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplication due to the commutativity of equality/non-equality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478" lineLink="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(GepNode &#42;N1, GepNode &#42;N2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uintptr&#95;t P1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uintptr&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(N1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(N1, N2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(N2, N1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494" lineLink="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(GepNode &#42;N1, GepNode &#42;N2, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a459e095622674d5e548005c7935b9fad">NodePairSet</a> &amp;Eq,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t cache the result for nodes with different hashes. The hash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comparison is fast enough.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(N1) != <a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(N2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> NP = <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(N1, N2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodePairSet::iterator FEq = Eq.find(NP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FEq != Eq.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodePairSet::iterator FNe = Ne.find(NP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FNe != Ne.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not previously compared.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Root1 = N1-&gt;Flags &amp; GepNode::Root;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t CmpFlags = GepNode::Root | GepNode::Pointer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Different = (N1-&gt;Flags &amp; CmpFlags) != (N2-&gt;Flags &amp; CmpFlags);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af63cc9889b2c41a6de00cb55dbd4d8de">NodePair</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="#a18f2c9c1625f4e3c68c38e480df1b44a">node&#95;pair</a>(N1, N2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the root/pointer flags have different values, the nodes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both nodes are root nodes, but their base pointers differ,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they are different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Different || (Root1 &amp;&amp; N1-&gt;BaseVal != N2-&gt;BaseVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Ne.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here the root/pointer flags are identical, and for root nodes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base pointers are equal, so the root nodes are equal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-root nodes, compare their parent nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Root1 || <a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(N1-&gt;Parent, N2-&gt;Parent, Eq, Ne)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Eq.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonCommonGEP::common() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The essence of this commoning is finding gep nodes that are equal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To do this we need to compare all pairs of nodes. To save time,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first, partition the set of all nodes into sets of potentially equal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes, and then compare pairs from within each partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodeSetMap = std::map&lt;unsigned, NodeSet&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NodeSetMap MaybeEq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a> = <a href="#a024b67de8e1a0251f785d326118fc7fb">node&#95;hash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaybeEq&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>&#93;.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the equivalence relation for the gep nodes.  Use two caches,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one for equality and the other for non-equality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#acaa4e34ced9ca464a485bef998fd70cd">NodeSymRel</a> EqRel;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Equality relation (as set of equivalence classes).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a459e095622674d5e548005c7935b9fad">NodePairSet</a> Eq, Ne;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Caches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : MaybeEq) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> &amp;S = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NI = S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a338faa1a1ee255653958fa9d3738d97d">begin</a>(), NE = S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a7b0a84486e65de95b236e90073067540">end</a>(); NI != NE; ++NI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = &#42;NI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If node already has a class, then the class must have been created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a prior iteration of this loop. Since equality is transitive,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nothing more will be added to that class, so skip it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a21cbbab6a6991f925afed97ead5bbf49">node&#95;class</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, EqRel))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a new class candidate now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">NodeSet::iterator</a> NJ = std::next(NI); NJ != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a>; ++NJ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a1d49d1a5a29512386e2fa1226e982e00">node&#95;eq</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, &#42;NJ, Eq, Ne))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.insert(&#42;NJ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Tmp is empty, N would be the only element in it. Don&#39;t bother</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating a class for it then.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finalize the set before adding it to the relation.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a projection from a NodeSet to the minimal element in it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ProjMap = std::map&lt;const NodeSet &#42;, GepNode &#42;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ProjMap PM;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> &amp;S : EqRel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t Flags = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af31e9c8ac9a922bab3f3c94f42658ac7">UseSet</a> &amp;MinUs = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;Min&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If N is used, append all original values of N to the list of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NF &amp; GepNode::Used)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The collected flags should include all the flags from the min element.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Commoning: for each non-root gep node, replace &quot;Parent&quot; with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selected (minimum) node from the corresponding equivalence class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a given parent does not have an equivalence class, leave it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ProjMap::iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = PM.find(PC);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;HexagonCommonGEP::recalculatePlacement(GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a5cc5275af9778343960c29967d15de79">NodeChildrenMap</a> &amp;NCM, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#a28658531264a81fb459c3fbe1fecb2fb">NodeToValueMap</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Loc for node:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recalculate the placement for Node, assuming that the locations of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its children in Loc are valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return nullptr if there is no valid placement for Node (for example, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses an index value that is not available at the location required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to dominate all children, etc.).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the nearest common dominator for:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - all users, if the node is used, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - all children.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ValueVect Bs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Flags &amp; GepNode::Used) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Append all blocks with uses of the original values to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block vector Bs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeToUsesMap::iterator UF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(UF != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.end() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Used node with no use information&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af31e9c8ac9a922bab3f3c94f42658ac7">UseSet</a> &amp;Us = UF-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;U : Us) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = U-&gt;getUser();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(R))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#afd1501c49c84f3addfd108c2484f5674">PB</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(R)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(R)-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Append the location of each child.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the child is only used in GEP instructions (i.e. is not used in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-GEP instructions), the nearest dominator computed for it may</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the index used by Node dominates the computed dominator.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse the loop nest upwards until we find a loop in which Node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is no longer invariant, or until we get to the upper limit of Node&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// placement. The traversal will also stop when a suitable &quot;preheader&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HexagonCommonGEP::separateConstantChains(GepNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;Flags &amp; GepNode::Used))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loads/stores that use the node N.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagoncommongep-cpp-/#af31e9c8ac9a922bab3f3c94f42658ac7">UseSet</a> LSs;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re interested in uses that provide the address. It can happen</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the value may also be provided via GEP, but we won&#39;t handle</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;Ld-&gt;getOperandUse(PtrX) == U)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;St = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(R)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PtrX = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst/#add13b402166ae4d70f5b93c3c4cfba99">StoreInst::getPointerOperandIndex</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;St-&gt;getOperandUse(PtrX) == U)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even if the total use count is 1, separating the chain may still be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beneficial, since the constant chain may be longer than the GEP alone</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would be (e.g. if the parent node has a constant index and also has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other children).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LSs.empty())</span></CodeLine>
